page.title: 03COUNTRY PARK EVENTS,HORNDEAN
page.content: The Country Fair Horndean. The theme of the country fair in 1985 was farming,forestry and conservation. The exhibitors all had associations with the countryside.There were local meat producers,fruit and vegetable growers and fish farmers displaying their produce.Spinners, weavers saddlers,blacksmiths,woodworkers and hurdle makers demonstrated their crafts.There was a competition for different breeds of sheep and sheep dog trials.The Blackmoor Vale axemen gave a display of their skills.A parade of heavy horses and a display of vintage farm machinery was followed by a straw handling competition for young farmers.The Petersfield branch of the Pony Club organised an early round of the Prince Phillips Cup Gymkhana Games.
